alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and southwestern Echols Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Jennings to Crossroads. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jennings, Statenville and Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
